keyMoments.title: Robin Confronted by Aokiji
keyMoments.description: Robin has a private encounter with Aokiji where she reveals she can no longer run away because she has finally found true friends.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Robin's acceptance of the Straw Hats as her family and her decision to stop running from her past.
keyMoments.quote: I can't run away anymore. Not when I've finally found my friends.

keyMoments.title: Learns of Aokiji's Connection to Saul
keyMoments.description: Aokiji reveals that Jaguar D. Saul was his close friend and explains why he has been watching over Robin.
keyMoments.significance: Provides Robin with closure about Aokiji's actions and motivations regarding her safety.

keyMoments.title: Learns of 20-Year Protection
keyMoments.description: Robin learns that Aokiji has been secretly protecting her for 20 years as a promise to Saul.
keyMoments.significance: Recontextualizes all of Robin's previous encounters with Aokiji and provides emotional closure.

keyMoments.title: Receives Aokiji's Blessing
keyMoments.description: Aokiji acknowledges Robin has found true friends and tells her to live with resolve as Ohara's last survivor.
keyMoments.significance: Officially ends Robin's 20-year period of running and fear, giving her permission to embrace her new life.

relationships.description: Robin learns that Aokiji has been protecting her for 20 years due to his promise to Saul, transforming her understanding of their relationship from enemy to reluctant guardian.

evolutionMoments.description: Aokiji reveals he protected Robin for 20 years and accepts her new life with the Straw Hats.

reveals.information: Robin has finally found true friends and can no longer run from her past
Aokiji has been protecting Robin for 20 years due to a promise to Jaguar D. Saul

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Koby reunites with Luffy after their separation, showing his growth as a Marine while maintaining their friendship.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates both characters' development since Episode 1 and their continued bond despite being on opposite sides.

keyMoments.title: Explains the New World
keyMoments.description: Koby reveals classified Navy information about the New World to Luffy, explaining it's where the next Pirate King will be crowned.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the concept of the New World to Luffy and the audience, setting up the next major phase of the story.
keyMoments.quote: The back half of the Grand Line is known as 'The New World.' It's where the next Pirate King will be crowned.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Calm Belt Technology
keyMoments.description: Koby shares Navy intelligence about Seastone technology that allows Marine ships to traverse the Calm Belt.
keyMoments.significance: Provides important world-building information about Marine capabilities and technology.

keyMoments.title: First Mention of Dr. Vegapunk
keyMoments.description: Koby mentions Dr. Vegapunk for the first time, crediting him with Devil Fruit research and Seastone technology.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of one of the series' most important scientists whose work impacts the entire story.
keyMoments.quote: It's all thanks to Dr. Vegapunk's research on Devil Fruits.

keyMoments.title: Declares Dream to Become Admiral
keyMoments.description: Koby boldly declares his ambition to become an Admiral and challenges Luffy to meet him in the New World as rivals.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Koby's ultimate goal and sets up his future rivalry with Luffy while maintaining their friendship.
keyMoments.quote: My dream is to become an Admiral! Even though we're enemies now, let's meet again in the New World and see whose dream comes true!

relationships.description: Koby and Luffy maintain their friendship while acknowledging they are now on opposite sides. They establish a friendly rivalry to meet in the New World.

evolutionMoments.description: Koby challenges Luffy to meet in the New World as rivals pursuing opposing dreams.

reveals.information: Koby's ultimate dream is to become an Admiral in the Navy
Koby has access to classified Navy information about the New World and Marine technology

keyMoments.title: Confronts Robin
keyMoments.description: Aokiji appears privately to Robin during the celebration party to address their complicated relationship.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the revelations about his connection to Saul and his protection of Robin.
keyMoments.quote: Why didn't you run away like you had for 20 years?

keyMoments.title: Reveals Friendship with Saul
keyMoments.description: Aokiji reveals that Jaguar D. Saul was his close friend and that he was forced by duty to kill him during the Ohara Buster Call.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial context for Aokiji's character and explains his conflicted nature regarding Robin.
keyMoments.quote: Jaguar D. Saul was a close friend of mine. I was forced by duty to kill him that day.

keyMoments.title: Reveals 20-Year Protection of Robin
keyMoments.description: Aokiji explains he made a promise to Saul to keep Robin safe and has been watching over her for 20 years.
keyMoments.significance: Recontextualizes all of Aokiji's previous actions regarding Robin and shows his honor in keeping promises.
keyMoments.quote: Saul asked me one favor before he died - to make sure you were safe. For 20 years, I've kept tabs on you.

keyMoments.title: Gives Robin His Blessing
keyMoments.description: Aokiji accepts that Robin has found true friends with the Straw Hats and tells her to live with resolve as Ohara's last survivor.
keyMoments.significance: Completes Aokiji's 20-year mission to protect Robin and gives her permission to move forward with her life.
keyMoments.quote: With true friends, you can stop running from your past and stand tall as the last survivor of Ohara. Live your life with resolve.

relationships.description: Saul was Aokiji's close friend before the Ohara incident. Aokiji was forced to kill him but honored Saul's dying wish to protect Robin.

evolutionMoments.description: Aokiji reveals his friendship with Saul and the promise he made to protect Robin.

relationships.description: Aokiji protected Robin from afar for 20 years as a promise to Saul, despite his duty as a Marine putting them at odds.

evolutionMoments.description: Aokiji acknowledges Robin has found true friends and ends his 20-year protection mission.

reveals.information: Aokiji and Jaguar D. Saul were close friends
Aokiji promised Saul he would protect Robin and has been watching over her for 20 years
Aokiji's 'Lazy Justice' allows him to honor personal bonds while fulfilling his Marine duties

keyMoments.title: Spared by Garp
keyMoments.description: Luffy learns that his grandfather Garp is letting him go free despite his pirate activities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the complicated family dynamics between Luffy and Garp.

keyMoments.title: Learns About the New World
keyMoments.description: Luffy learns from Koby about the New World, the second half of the Grand Line where the Pirate King will be crowned.
keyMoments.significance: Sets Luffy's sights on the next major phase of his journey toward becoming Pirate King.

keyMoments.title: Accepts Koby's Challenge
keyMoments.description: Luffy accepts Koby's challenge to meet in the New World as rivals, encouraging Koby to achieve his dream of becoming Admiral.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the friendly rivalry between Luffy and Koby that will span the series.
keyMoments.quote: You got it! I challenge you to make that dream come true!

relationships.description: Luffy and Koby establish a friendly rivalry to meet in the New World and see whose dream comes true first.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy accepts Koby's challenge to meet in the New World as worthy rivals.

reveals.information: Luffy now knows about the New World and that it's where he needs to go to become Pirate King

keyMoments.title: Spares Luffy
keyMoments.description: Garp announces he will not arrest Luffy despite his pirate activities, citing their family bond as his excuse to the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Garp's internal conflict between duty and family, choosing family in this instance.
keyMoments.quote: I'll let you go since you're my grandson. I'll use that as an excuse when I tell the Marines.

reveals.information: Garp prioritizes his family bond with Luffy over his Marine duty when he can justify it

keyMoments.title: Overhears Navy Intelligence
keyMoments.description: Nami secretly listens to Koby's classified information about the New World, Calm Belt, and Navy technology while appearing to relax.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's tactical intelligence gathering and ensures the crew has knowledge about their future destination.

reveals.information: Nami actively gathers intelligence even during celebrations, showing her tactical mindset
